attributes.action: legislate to reduce the amount of packaging used by manufacturers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are hearing more and more about how we should be charged for the amount of waste we produce when surely the obvious answer is to reduce the amount of packaging which will become waste that we take into our homes. I would suggest the amount of packaging we bring back from the supermarket could be reduced by 50% and the remaining 50% could all be bio-degradable as an easily achievable target

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
